title: OtterBox debuts first magnetic iPhone 13 power bank with MagSafe charging passthrough
content:
Today, OtterBox is expanding its collection of MagSafe accessories with what might be its most unique offering yet. Arriving as its first power bank, the new OtterBox release packs a 5,000mAh battery on top of the novel inclusion of MagSafe passthrough. Now available for purchase, all of the details are down below.

more…

The post OtterBox debuts first magnetic iPhone 13 power bank with MagSafe charging passthrough appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: OtterBox MagSafe Power Bank arrives with a 5,000mAh battery and the unique feature of MagSafe charging passthrough, plus more.
